subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The Rams’ owner, Stan Kroenke, has announced plans to build an 80,000-seat football stadium in California, but St. Louis responded on Friday with a plan for an outdoor stadium along the Mississippi River.
snippet: The Rams’ owner, Stan Kroenke, has announced plans to build an 80,000-seat football stadium in California, but St. Louis responded on Friday with a plan for an outdoor stadium along the Mississippi River.
